saveRotation.name: Save head rotation
saveRotation.description: If it should save the position you looked at when you died.

backCommand.name: Toggle /back
backCommand.description: §b/back §fsends '§b/tp @p <x> <y> <z> <yaw> <pitch>§f' in the chat to teleport you.

coordsCommand.name: Toggle /coords
coordsCommand.description: §b/coords §fsends you the coordinates where your last death point was.

messages.noSavedPoint: There is no death point saved!
